item.title: The IKEA Effect - Why managers fall in love with their own ideas
item.description: When and why the IKEA effect causes managers to overvalue their own ideas. Examples of organisational pitfalls of the IKEA effect. 4 ways you can defend against the IKEA effect: 1) Acknowledge your unconscious bias; 2) Spike rough prototypes; 3) Talk to customers; 4) Run growth experiments

item.title: Tips to Get Started with Cosmopolitan Libc
item.description: I recently learned a little bit about Cosmopolitan Libc to make a portable executable of clp, a small program written for POSIX systems. I had a little bit of trouble getting started at first, so I thought it might be useful to write up what I learned. In this blog post I’ll share some of my notes on the basics of Cosmopolitan and demonstrate a couple approaches to building software with it.
